scripts.build-client: cd client && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.cp-cli-to-svr: cd server && rm -rf dist/build && mv ../client/build dist && cd ../
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run build-client && npm run cp-cli-to-svr && npm run build-server
